message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the value of the product to me.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a lower price, but $8000 is simply too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $9500? I'm willing to be flexible to reach an agreement.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to be flexible, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we try $8500? I'm willing to meet you halfway from our previous offer.
Bob, I'm really trying to work with you here, but $8500 is still too low for me. If you're willing to go up to $9000, I'm happy to close the deal. Otherwise, I might have to consider other options.
Hi Alice, I understand you're trying to make a deal, but I'm really close to my budget. How about we try $8200? I'm willing to go up a bit, but I need to stay within my means.
